author: brianp
msg: Buffer partial lines within ap_core_input_filter() when doing
AP_MODE_GETLINE reads on a nonblocking connection

author: niallp
msg: Refactor "routines" package to provide localized pattern support, provide currency and percent support for all numeric types and improve JUnit test cases.

author: cbegin
msg: Implemented stats based name matcher for use with auto crud ops generation

author: rooneg
msg: Fix an assert that occurs when you destroy a rwlock on win32 and later clear
the pool it was allocated from.
(apr_thread_rwlock_destroy): Use apr_pool_cleanup_run to call our cleanup
(thread_rwlock_cleanup): Put the destruction of the rwlock here instead
(test_thread_rwlocks): Destroy the rwlock explicitly so we can see this
